data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nessimian, Jorge Luiz (2017): Resurrecting the genus Enitharoides Brooks, 1953 (Heteroptera: Nepomorpha: Notonectidae): description of three new species and redescription of Enitharoides brasiliensis (Spinola, 1837), comb. nov.
